name: Space Pilgrim Episode III: Delta Pavonis
description: Still reeling from the life-changing events of the previous episode, Gail seeks out a safe haven with her father in the Delta Pavonis system. However, she soon learns that the politics of Planet Leto can be as treacherous and unpredictable as the local weather.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 Mhz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: DirectSound-compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: By far the longest of the bunch so far, I greatly enjoyed it and the core storyline was intriguing and very enjoyable. The writing has improved over the series, and you can definitely tell this one has been the best so far.
Great little gem if you like sci-fi. Very good writing also.

Sent this game via Keymailer, and I cant even record it. What I saw and played of it, which wasnt much, didnt really interest me. However, that was just me. If you enjoy this type of game, its an okay little game. Just dont try to record it.
Episode 3, more to do with our hero.. story picking up just about from where the previous left off. Still wonderful story. This one the longest game yet of this series.
Not your usual rpg-maker game, but good quest
